struct  UART_RING_BUFFER_T
 UART Ring buffer structure. More...

Defines

#define SLAVE_ADDR_A   'A'
#define SLAVE_ADDR_B   'B'
#define UART_RING_BUFSIZE   256
#define __BUF_MASK   (UART_RING_BUFSIZE-1)
#define __BUF_IS_FULL(head, tail)   ((tail&__BUF_MASK)==((head+1)&__BUF_MASK))
#define __BUF_WILL_FULL(head, tail)   ((tail&__BUF_MASK)==((head+2)&__BUF_MASK))
#define __BUF_IS_EMPTY(head, tail)   ((head&__BUF_MASK)==(tail&__BUF_MASK))
#define __BUF_RESET(bufidx)   (bufidx=0)
#define __BUF_INCR(bufidx)   (bufidx=(bufidx+1)&__BUF_MASK)

uint32_t UARTReceive ( LPC_UART_TypeDef *  UARTPort,
uint8_t *  rxbuf,
uint8_t  buflen 
)

UART read function for interrupt mode (using ring buffers).

Parameters:
[in] UARTPort Selected UART peripheral used to send data, should be UART0
[out] rxbuf Pointer to Received buffer
[in] buflen Length of Received buffer
Returns:
Number of bytes actually read from the ring buffer
